Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Reading & watching plays (Marathi Theatre) and listening to old melody songs and spiritual speeches
Other Information: Propagated the thoughts of Bharatratna Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar, Mahatma Jyotiba Phule and Chhatrapati Shahu Maharaj, the great social reformist; Founder Chairman, (i) Abhay Shikshan Kendra, 1970; (ii) Rayat Mahasangh, 1993
Name: Gaikwad,Shri Eknath Mahadeo
Positions Held:
1967-69
Vice-President, H-Ward, District Yuvak Congress

1978-80
Organiser Secretary, Mumbai Regional Congress Committee

1983-85
Joint Secretary, Maharashtra Pradesh Congress Committee

1985-95 and 1999-2004
Member, Maharashtra Legislative Assembly (three terms)

1990-91
General Secretary, Maharashtra Pradesh Congress Committee

1993-95
Minister of State, Housing, Labour, Social Welfare, Women and Child Welfare and Special Assistance, Government of Maharashtra

1997-2003
General Secretary, Mumbai Regional Congress Committee

1999-2004
Minister of State, Public Health, Medical Education & Family Welfare, Government of Maharashtra

2004
Elected to 14th Lok Sabha
Member, Committee on Social Justice & Empowerment
Member, Committee on Welfare of Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes
Member, Consultative Committee, Ministry of Industries and Public Enterprises
Member, The National Oilseed and Vegetable Oil Development Board, Ministry of Agriculture

5 Aug. 2007
Member, Committee on Social Justice & Empowerment

2009
Re-elected to 15th Lok Sabha (2nd term)

31 Aug. 2009
Member, Committee on Urban Development

6 Aug. 2009
Member, Committee on Welfare of Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes

16 Sep. 2009
Member, Consultative Committee for Ministry of Women and Child Development

26 Nov. 2009
Member, Regional Direct Taxes Advisory Committee
